meanings.definition: The act of making something tender.
meanings.sent1: The tenderization of the meat made it easy to chew.
meanings.sent2: Proper tenderization of the steak resulted in a delicious meal.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret to tenderization was a special marinade.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness had a tenderization effect on his heart.
meanings.sent5: The tenderization of the dough made the cookies soft and delightful.

meanings.definition: The process of breaking down tough fibers in meat to make it more tender.
meanings.sent1: The tenderization of the beef required hours of marinating.
meanings.sent2: Resting the meat after tenderization helped retain its juices.
meanings.sent3: The tenderization process turned the steak into a tender masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The tenderization of the pork was like a gentle massage for the meat.
meanings.sent5: After proper tenderization, the meat practically melted in your mouth.
